entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
